title: Walter Plume and the Dehydrated Imagination
description: Walter’s summer looks downright boring. But before his imagination breathes its last breath, Walter stumbles into a mystical land—a land where he has magic! He soon finds himself facing off against the evil Ickabod Von Snot-hook in a battle that will change everything. Funny, fast-paced, and full of surprises, this book is guaranteed to leave you laughing.
author: Rebecca Lynn Morales
